meta.description: Distribute medical supplies among hospitals to meet their needs at minimum transfer cost.

sets.name: HOSPITALS
sets.description: Set of hospitals involved in the supply distribution.

params.name: initial_stock
params.description: Initial stock of supplies at each hospital.

params.name: required_stock
params.description: Required stock of supplies at each hospital.

params.name: transfer_cost
params.description: Cost of transferring supplies between hospitals.

vars.name: transfer
vars.description: Amount of supplies transferred from one hospital to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(transfer_cost[i][j] * transfer[i][j] for i in HOSPITALS for j in HOSPITALS if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of transferring supplies between hospitals.

constraints.name: balance_hospital_1
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['1'] + transfer['2']['1'] + transfer['3']['1'] + transfer['4']['1'] - transfer['1']['2'] - transfer['1']['3'] - transfer['1']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 1 meets its required stock.

constraints.name: balance_hospital_2
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['2'] + transfer['1']['2'] + transfer['3']['2'] + transfer['4']['2'] - transfer['2']['1'] - transfer['2']['3'] - transfer['2']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 2 meets its required stock.

constraints.name: balance_hospital_3
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['3'] + transfer['1']['3'] + transfer['2']['3'] + transfer['4']['3'] - transfer['3']['1'] - transfer['3']['2'] - transfer['3']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 3 meets its required stock.

constraints.name: balance_hospital_4
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['4'] + transfer['1']['4'] + transfer['2']['4'] + transfer['3']['4'] - transfer['4']['1'] - transfer['4']['2'] - transfer['4']['3']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 4 meets its required stock.
